title: Strengthening Programming Practical Skills: Learner-Centered Mobile Programming Education Course—Java Fundamentals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously design at least three solution strategies by analyzing given Java project requirements.
Learners can complete an average of over 80% of learning modules in a mobile environment according to a weekly learning plan.
Learners can suggest five or more meaningful improvements when evaluating peer code and providing feedback through a peer review system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
